oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Applikationstechniken zur Regulierung von Sch채dlingen im Gem체sebau
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: State of the Art: Many organic pesticides have reduced effectiveness due to UV degradation. New application techniques (e.g. under-leaf application) could help to solve this problem in organic vegetable production. Definition of the problem: All microbial biocontrol agents and pesticides of vegetal origin are UV degraded. New application technology could augment effectiveness of these products. Project aims: Find new application technologies for a more adapted application of organic pesticides and microbial biocontrol agents in organic vegetable production. Methodology: On-farm test of different new application techniques and with different pesticide agents.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Project} Applikationstechniken zur Regulierung von Sch채dlingen im Gem체sebau. [Application techniques to control pests in vegetables.] Runs 2003 - 2007. Project Leader(s): Wyss, Eric, Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FiBL), CH-5070 Frick.
